title: Batman Beyond: The Animated Series Classics Compendium
description: Twenty-five years since the debut of the fan-favorite animated series, the original comic book adventures of Terry McGinnis return a totally schway all-new collection!In 1999, fans met Terry McGinnis for the first time in the Batman Beyond animated series—a new Batman for a new era, mentored by Bruce Wayne and fighting crime in a futuristic Gotham City!  That same year, Terry made his comic book debut, encountering threats such as Blight, Inque, and the Jokerz! These stories—including the unprecedented meeting between Batman Beyond and the Batman of the present—return in this massive compendium collection!
author: Hilary J. Bader
